chapter.text: khwam hayna cng prasb dæ brrda phu thahı phrxng (nı kar twng læa kar chang)
khux brrda phu thi meux phwk khea twng xea cak khn xun k twng xea tem
læa meux phwk khea twng hrux chang hı khn xun k thahı khad
chn hela nan midi khid bang hrux wa phwk khea ca thuk hı fun khunchiph
sahrab wan xan ying hıy
Wan thi mnusʹy ca yun txhna phracea hæng sakl lok
michı chen nan thæcring banthuk khxng brrda khn chaw nan xyu nı sicyin
læa xan dı lea thahı cea ru di wa sicyin nan khux xari
khux banthuk thi thuk caruk wi
khwam hayna nı wan nan cng prasb dæ brrda phu ptiseth
khux brrda phu ptiseth wan hæng kar txbthæn
læa mimi khır ptiseth wan hæng kar txbthæn nan nxkcak thuk khn thi lameid thi krathakhwamphid
meux brrda xa yat khxng rea thuk xan kæ khea khea ca klaw wa ni khux niyay helw hiw smay kxn
michı chen nan tæwa sing thi phwk khea di khwnkhway wi nan di pen snim bn hawcı khxng phwk khea
michı chen nan thæcring phwk khea nı wan nan ca thuk kan cak phracea khxng phwk khea
læw thæcring phwk khea ca kheapi xyu nı nrk thi mi pelw fi luk son
læw ca miseiyng klaw khun wa ni khux sing thi phwk cea di ptiseth man wi
michı chen nan thæcring banthuk khxng brrda phuthrng khunthrrm xyu nı xil li yin xyang nænxn
læa xan dı lea thahı cea ru di wa xil li yin khux xari
khux banthuk thi thuk caruk wi
brrda phu thi xyu kıl chid (mla xik ahˌ) ca pen phu dulæ raksʹa
thæcring brrda phuthrng khunthrrm ca xyu nı khwam pordpran xyang nænxn
phwk khea ca mxng du cak bn teiyng
cea ca ru di thung kar mi khwam sdchun hæng khwam sukh saray thi prakt xyu bn bıhna khxng phwk khea
phwk khea ca di dum sura xan brisuththi sung thuk phnuk wi
thi chı phnuk man nan khux chamdcheiyng læa nı kar ni brrda phu khængkhan (thi ca hı di ma sung khwam sukh saray ni) cng khængkhan kan theid
thi chı phsm sura nan ma cak tas nim
khux tana hæng hnung sung brrda phu kıl chid (xallxhˌ) theanan ca di dum man
thæcring brrda phu kratha phid nan khey hawreaa yeaa brrda phu sraththa
læa meux brrda phu sraththa dein phan phwk khea pi phwk khea ca hliwta yey hyan
læa meux phwk khea klab pi yang phwkphxng khxng phwk khea phwk khea k klab pi xyang tlkkhanxng
Læa meux phwk khea hen brrda phu sraththa phwk khea k klaw wa thæcring chn hela ni pen phu hlng thang nænxn
læa phwk khea (phu ptiseth sraththa) midi thuk sng ma pheux pen phu pkpakraksʹa phu sraththa hela nan
dangnan wan ni brrda phu sraththa k ca hawreaa yeaa phwk ptiseth sraththa bang
phwk khea (brrda phu sraththa) ca mxng du xyu bn teiyng
brrda phu ptiseth ca di rab kar txbthæn tam thi di ptibati ma michı hrux
